cons: Pregnant women should avoid using this herb in any case.
Allergic skin irritation and severe, whole-body allergic reaction have been reported.
description: It is having anti-oxidant and health promoting properties.
It helps to reduce body weight, and the blood sugar and cholesterol levels in the blood.

It helps to control heart rate and blood pressure.
This herb root helps to the human body stave off infections, cancer, and neurologic conditions.
